title: Force Lance
data:
{{version030}} ''For the [[unrand]] polearm, see [[Force Lance (unrand)]].'' {{Flavour|Fires a shaft of concussive force. If the impact deals damage, it may knock the target back.}} '''Force Lance''' is a monster-only spell which deals damage and knocks the target back. The chance to knock back depends on the caster's [[HD]] and target [[size]]. If the target is a monster, it is briefly stunned (4-9 [[aut]]s). The maximum distance is 2 + 6 * [[HD]]/25 tiles. If it would knock a creature into impassable terrain ([[wall]]s, [[deep water]], [[lava]], through a monster), movement is stopped and the target takes impact damage instead. It cannot move stationary monsters like [[statue]]s or [[oklob plant]]s. {{monsters with spell}} ==Strategy== Force Lance can push you off [[stairs]], so be careful when [[stair dancing]]. In other cases, the knock back is usually a minor nuisance, though it can mess with your positioning. It can be particularly bad for melee characters, who have to spend turns moving towards the enemy. ==History== {{Spell |name=Force Lance |level=4 |school1={{Translocations}} |school2={{Conjurations}} |school3= |sources=
*[[Book of the Warp]]
|castingnoise=5 |spellnoise=5 }} {{AttackSpell |name=Force Lance |formula = 2d(6+Power/6) |maxdmg = 2d(22.66) ~ 23.66 |maxsp = 100 |range = 4 |target = Beam |tohit = 10+Power/7 |special = Knockback |hit_type = normal |hit_adder = 10 |hit_num = 1 |hit_denom = 7 |dam_calculator = dicedef |dam_numdice = 2 |dam_adder = 12 |dam_num = 2 |dam_denom = 6}} *Prior to [[0.25]], Force Lance was a level 4 [[Translocations]]/[[Conjurations]] spell available to players. *Prior to [[0.16]], Force Lance was a level 4 pure [[Conjurations]] spell, was less accurate, and did not knock enemies back as effectively. *Prior to [[0.14]], Force Lance was a level 5 spell. *Prior to [[0.13]], Force Lance was a level 2 spell in the [[book of Conjurations]] with less range and damage. *Force Lance was added in [[0.12]].
